description: '''Minibosses''' is an American [[progressive rock]] band originally from [[Northampton, Massachusetts]], and now located in [[Phoenix, Arizona]]. They are known for their [[Video game music culture|video game music]] [[Cover version|covers]], which are [[instrumental rock]] variations of the theme music from classic [[Nintendo Entertainment System|Nintendo]] [[video game]]s such as ''[[Mega Man (original series)|Mega Man]]'', ''[[Metroid]]'', and ''[[Castlevania]]''. The ''[[Phoenix New Times]]'' awarded Minibosses their ''best cover band'' award in 2006.
